author: Omkar Godbole
title: Bitcoin Price Slips Below $100K, Hinting Oil-Led Risk-Off on Wall Street
description: Bitcoin fell below $100,000 on Sunday, its lowest point since May 8. XRP, ETH and SOL followed suit.
content:
Bitcoin 
 fell below $100,000 on Sunday, its lowest point since May, signalling risk aversion on Wall Street on Monday amid reports that Iran is leaning towards blocking the Strait of Hormuz.The Str… [+1130 chars]
